title: ISic000179. Epitaph for Halaesina
body:
Facsimile Images

Halaesina
vixit ann(is)
[------]

Apparatus criticus

Text after Gualtherus; Gualtherus: VIXIT.ANN.; Mommsen: VIXIT · ANN; it is impossible to know whether interpuncts were originally visible on the stone.

translation

Halaesa lived for [--] years [---]

commentary

Mommsen speculates that a line is missing below, containing the age (potentially in months and days also).

bibliography
